org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation

Annotation Type XmlConfig


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @PropertyStoreApply(value=XmlConfigApply.class)
public @interface XmlConfig
    Annotation for specifying config properties defined in XmlSerializer, XmlDocSerializer, and XmlParser.

    Used primarily for specifying bean configuration properties on REST classes and methods.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String addBeanTypes
      Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.
      String addNamespaceUrisToRoot
      Configuration property: Add namespace URLs to the root element.
      String autoDetectNamespaces
      Configuration property: Auto-detect namespace usage.
      String defaultNamespace
      Configuration property: Default namespace.
      String enableNamespaces
      Configuration property: Enable support for XML namespaces.
      Class<? extends XMLEventAllocator> eventAllocator
      Configuration property: XML event allocator.
      String[] namespaces
      Configuration property: Default namespaces.
      String preserveRootElement
      Configuration property: Preserve root element during generalized parsing.
      int rank
      Optional rank for this config.
      Class<? extends XMLReporter> reporter
      Configuration property: XML reporter.
      Class<? extends XMLResolver> resolver
      Configuration property: XML resolver.
      String validating
      Configuration property: Enable validation.
      String xsNamespace
      Configuration property: XMLSchema namespace.

    • Element Detail

      • rank

        public abstract int rank
        Optional rank for this config.

        Can be used to override default ordering and application of config annotations.

        Default:
        0

      • eventAllocator

        public abstract Class<? extends XMLEventAllocator> eventAllocator
        Configuration property: XML event allocator.

        Associates an XMLEventAllocator with this parser.

        • XmlParser.XML_eventAllocator
        Default:
        org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlEventAllocator.Null.class

      • preserveRootElement

        public abstract String preserveRootElement
        Configuration property: Preserve root element during generalized parsing.

        If "true", when parsing into a generic ObjectMap, the map will contain a single entry whose key is the root element name.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlParser.preserveRootElement.b".
        • XmlParser.XML_preserveRootElement
        Default:
        ""

      • reporter

        public abstract Class<? extends XMLReporter> reporter
        Configuration property: XML reporter.

        Associates an XMLReporter with this parser.

        • Reporters are not copied to new parsers during a clone.
        • XmlParser.XML_reporter
        Default:
        org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlReporter.Null.class

      • resolver

        public abstract Class<? extends XMLResolver> resolver
        Configuration property: XML resolver.

        Associates an XMLResolver with this parser.

        • XmlParser.XML_resolver
        Default:
        org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlResolver.Null.class

      • validating

        public abstract String validating
        Configuration property: Enable validation.

        If "true", XML document will be validated.

        See XMLInputFactory.IS_VALIDATING for more info.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlParser.validating.b".
        • XmlParser.XML_validating
        Default:
        ""

      • addBeanTypes

        public abstract String addBeanTypes
        Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.

        If "true", then "_type" properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred through reflection.

        When present, this value overrides the Serializer.SERIALIZER_addBeanTypes setting and is provided to customize the behavior of specific serializers in a SerializerGroup.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.addBeanTypes.b".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_addBeanTypes
        Default:
        ""

      • addNamespaceUrisToRoot

        public abstract String addNamespaceUrisToRoot
        Configuration property: Add namespace URLs to the root element.

        Use this setting to add xmlns:x attributes to the root element for the default and all mapped namespaces.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • This setting is ignored if XmlSerializer.XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.addNamespaceUrisToRoot.b".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        ""

      • autoDetectNamespaces

        public abstract String autoDetectNamespaces
        Configuration property: Auto-detect namespace usage.

        Detect namespace usage before serialization.

        Used in conjunction with XmlSerializer.XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot to reduce the list of namespace URLs appended to the root element to only those that will be used in the resulting document.

        If enabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

        This setting is ignored if XmlSerializer.XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.

        • Auto-detection of namespaces can be costly performance-wise.
          In high-performance environments, it's recommended that namespace detection be disabled, and that namespaces be manually defined through the XmlSerializer.XML_namespaces property.
        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.autoDetectNamespaces.b".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_autoDetectNamespaces
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        ""

      • defaultNamespace

        public abstract String defaultNamespace
        Configuration property: Default namespace.

        Specifies the default namespace URI for this document.

        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.defaultNamespace.s".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_defaultNamespace
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        ""

      • enableNamespaces

        public abstract String enableNamespaces
        Configuration property: Enable support for XML namespaces.

        If not enabled, XML output will not contain any namespaces regardless of any other settings.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.enableNamespaces.b".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_enableNamespaces
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        ""

      • namespaces

        public abstract String[] namespaces
        Configuration property: Default namespaces.

        The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.namespaces.ls".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_namespaces
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        {}

      • xsNamespace

        public abstract String xsNamespace
        Configuration property: XMLSchema namespace.

        Specifies the namespace for the XMLSchema namespace, used by the schema generated by the XmlSchemaSerializer class.

        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "XmlSerializer.xsNamespace.s".
        • XmlSerializer.XML_xsNamespace
        • Overview > juneau-marshall > XML Details > Namespaces
        Default:
        ""
